title: Is outsourcing really a good thing to do? - Quora

response.answer_text: YES! I personally think you should consider outsourcing when you realize your business is not growing or when you are investing too much time in finishing tasks that are menial, or when there is staff shortage. A business needs to innovate; and to innovate the business owner must find time or manpower to manage everything effectively. Fortunately, there are lot of companies in the industry that can offer you accounting support, thereby giving you the time to scale your operations. Here are the benefits of outsourcing accounting services: Staff shortage no moreDon’t have people to take care of your overflow work? It is OKAY! You can always outsource menial jobs and always have buffer staff at your disposal. Increased monetary savingsSince you won’t spend time doing tedious jobs but focus on creating and executing business plans, you would obviously look at high-profitability jobs! Improved operational excellenceA chunk of your work gets managed by someone else. That’s great because then you can shorten your processes and make them smoother. Time creationYour outsourcing partner will take care of time-consuming jobs and in return, create time for you to look at finishing innovative activities. Disclaimer: I am a Business Development Head at QXAS US.

Not all companies need outsourcing, but it did wonders for the businesses that decided to outsource. It’s the right decision if: You’re working on a limited budget. Sometimes hiring an in-house staff can be too expensive, especially for a small business or a start-up. Outsourcing to virtual assistants from other countries, like the Philippines, are cost-effective as they usually cost less compared to Western standards, but are as skilled and competitive.You are dealing with a highly specialized task. Many virtual assistants are skilled professionals who are experts in web development, digital marketing, and customer support among others. Outsourcing to VAs the tasks where you do not have expertise is a great idea to boost efficiency.You want to free up your time. Many entrepreneurs hire VAs so they can spend more time on other areas of their business, or to simply spend more time with their families or other passions they want to cultivate.
